original_title: Screen Test [ST292]: Niki de Saint Phalle
overview: The artist and sculptor Niki de Saint Phalle is filmed against the sparkly background of the Factory. She looks elegant, solemn, and slightly sad. Her large-eyed gaze seems to avoid direct engagement with the camera; towards the end of the roll, she strokes her chin pensively.
title: Screen Test [ST292]: Niki de Saint Phalle
